thread.title: Hotel was more than we expected
thread.title_full: Hotel was more than we expected - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lrhodes1965
title: Hotel was more than we expected
text: This was our sixth visit to New York and we usually stayed at another hotel in Times Square but on this occasion we stayed here. It is a lovely hotel and the room we had was spacious and modern with all the amenities. We were on the 9th floor and it was very quiet. The reception staff were welcoming and helpful as was the concierge. We didn't use the bar or eat in the hotel on this visit but I am sure we will next time.
